name: Grafi
description: Grafilab is building a decentralized AI ecosystem that empowers anyone—from everyday users to seasoned developers—to actively take part in the creation, deployment, and commercialization of AI. With intuitive tools like the CeDePIN Cloud, Co-Builder platform, and AI App Store, users can build, train, and monetize AI agents without needing deep technical expertise. What makes Grafilab stand out is its AI Data Layer, a secure and transparent on-chain infrastructure that ensures data integrity, ownership, and traceability throughout the AI development process. By combining accessible technology with decentralized infrastructure, Grafilab lowers the barrier to entry and opens the door for global participation in AI. It’s not just a platform—it’s a movement toward making AGI (Artificial General Intelligence) development inclusive, efficient, and community-driven.
